contacts.name: Lingsha
contacts.signature: Don't get angry, don't get mad, you don't have the time to feel so bad

201620000.text: {NICKNAME}, I recently prepared a new batch of incense

201620001.text: Some of them I feel would be well suited for use while traveling. Do you usually burn incense?

201620003.text: I see, then I'd love to get your opinion~

201620004.text: Unfortunately, I don't like the smell of incense

201620005.text: This batch was created with the latest technology that massively reduces the uncomfortable smokiness. Why not hear me out?

201620006.text: There is a proper order within a scent profile that must be considered â€” with top notes, middle notes, and base notes

201620007.text: Different people require different combinations of fragrances for perfect harmony

201620008.text: For instance, Miss March 7th has a sweet and fresh aroma, like peach blossom in full springtime bloom. She would be most suited to incense with the essence of hundreds of flowers to maintain her youth and dispel the weariness of ages

201620009.text: Another example would be Mr. Dan Heng. His demeanor is cold and aloof, but for those who struggle with issues from the past, nothing could be more comforting than incense obtained from Scalegorge deepsea ore. It eases the mind and prevents distracting thoughts

201620010.text: As for the esteemed navigator Miss Himeko, who I have admired for so long, I can only imagine that she is a woman of elegance and fine fragrance. This incense, derived from alien crystals, is capable of washing away fatigue and preserving her beauty

201620011.text: Also, I hear Mr. Yang is an extremely stable and reliable person. This incense derived from Xianzhou spring tea allows him to focus his mind on both meditation and creative work

201620012.text: I'm sure they'll all be grateful!

201620014.text: {NICKNAME}... I've thought long and hard about what kind of incense would suit you

201620015.text: Unlike the majority of people I have met, your fragrance is elusive and hard to put a finger on. There has always been a lingering hint of mystery about you

201620016.text: Rushing in and selecting an unsuitable incense for someone would only be counterproductive. {NICKNAME}, are there any scent profiles that you enjoy?

201620017.text: I like the scent of mung bean soda!

201620018.text: Well, that is uncommon... There aren't many people who can stand that smell even among the Xianzhou natives...

201620019.text: However, we are actually planning to create incense with such authentic Xianzhou scents~

201620020.text: I like the scent of cycranes!

201620021.text: Now you have me a little stumped...

201620022.text: You mean the sort of fragrance that makes people feel warm, safe, and punctual, right? Let me do some research~

201620023.text: I can't think of anything for now. I'll have a think

201620025.text: I'll have the incense I mentioned sent to the Express soon. I hope you like them~
